scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s build && cd ../learn_react && npm run build && xcopy /S /I /E "C:\Users\Khoa Le\Documents\Webstorm Projects\learn_react\build" "C:\Users\Khoa Le\Documents\Webstorm Projects\learn_nodejs\build"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
